GuideCfg.Describe: Oh, another young king has come to this vast land
Let's open up the territory, click on the level to start the battle!
Here is the owned Gold. Gold can be used to Building
Drag the joystick to move here and build the main castle
The number and location of Enemy will be displayed here
When you are ready, start fighting!
After each battle, you can choose 1 attribute enhancement! Make the next battle easier
Equipment is unlocked! Go check it out
Click the Enhance button to ConsumeGold to improve the Equipment attribute
There are many powerful treasures hidden in the world! Let's go and see
The first lottery is free Oh! Click here to try it.
Click on the treasure to see the details. You can also upgrade the treasure if you obtain it repeatedly!
It’s time to see our talent! This will make us more powerful!
Click the icon to view the detailed information of the talent
Click the unlock button to strengthen Building.
The house can provide Extra Gold (after the house is destroyed, it will not take effect on the same day)
Arrow Tower has powerful attack power which can help you resist Enemy
The city wall can block Enemy’s progress
The mill can provide you with more Gold (after the Building is destroyed, it will not take effect that day)
The barracks will recruit Soldiers for you, try click the summon button to summon all the Soldiers
